short_summary: While handling heavy objects or equipment operators are encouraged to use stump stools in combination with lifting aids or mechanical handling devices to reduce manual handling physical stress. As the implementation of controlling major workplace health and safety risks requires the training and competencies of workers in job hazardous industrial processes, relevant workplace policies, procedures and guidelines must be adhered to. Weighted stools, which are designed to counterbalance heavy loads and lift activities will be provided to counterbalance workstation. NOTE: Although customers who purchase this seat will be training in heavier lifting and assembling practices.
description: Industrial ergonomic stools are designed with a sturdy footrest and seat to provide a comfortable working height for workers. They are designed to be durable, rust-resistant and long-lasting. Note: Customer purchasing this product will receive a training on heavy lifting and assembling practices.
